# ðŸª„ Styling Guide

VSLook group the styles into

- [Components](#components) (e.g Input, Button)
- [Layouts](#layouts) (e.g Activity Bar, Side Bar)
- [Editors](#editors) (e.g Pane, Tabs)
- [Syntaxes](#syntaxes) (e.g Variables, Functions)

  <br/>
